src_original: mahāmokṣapuraṃ vairocanasvabhāvaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāram aṣṭābhiḥ śmaśānaiḥ sarvalokadhātunairātmyasūcakaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dhyāyāt.
calaccitrapatākāgraghaṇṭāmukharadiṅmukham /  paramaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmair upahāraiś ca harṣaṇam //
bhānunākrāntahṛdayaṃ śaśinānye tu kātarāḥ //  tatra madhyāsanasyopari pañcadaśabhiḥ svaraiś candramaṇḍalam ādarśajñānasvabhāvam,
